entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 3.

entry.title: Monday: A few showers. Temperature steady near plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few showers beginning in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature steady near plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
